title: Should She Choose Disney Magic Or Holy Matrimony?
description:
As if making decisions wasn’t hard enough, what do you do when you have to choose between being a Disney Princess or your Roommates Bridesmaid?
A Bert Show listener has a tough decision to make. “Mickey’s Not So Scary Halloween Party” is coming up and so is her former roommate Carly’s wedding and she’s not exactly sure which one to choose. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
